content.raw:
This is really cool and has a very powerful API! I played a bit with it and made a 3d plot plugin :smile: https://youtu.be/2OQc2Njjmcw 

The plugin is in branch [markers_3d_plot](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/markers_3d_plot%0Dmarkers#diff), but it's not very useful yet.

The plugin is using `SPHERE`, which at 100Hz, quickly overwhelms the render engine. I also tried:

* `LINE_LIST`, appending a point to the message at each iteration and using the same id, so it modifies the previous one. For some reason that was only drawing the beginning of the line and then it stopped. The message seemed to be properly growing though. I didn't investigate much further.

* `POINTS`, adding a new point each iteration, basically the same as for the spheres, but the points weren't showing up. I didn't investigate much more either.
content.html:
This is really cool and has a very powerful API! I played a bit with it and made a 3d plot plugin https://youtu.be/2OQc2Njjmcw

The plugin is in branch markers_3d_plot, but it's not very useful yet.

The plugin is using SPHERE, which at 100Hz, quickly overwhelms the render engine. I also tried:

  • LINE_LIST, appending a point to the message at each iteration and using the same id, so it modifies the previous one. For some reason that was only drawing the beginning of the line and then it stopped. The message seemed to be properly growing though. I didn't investigate much further.

  • POINTS, adding a new point each iteration, basically the same as for the spheres, but the points weren't showing up. I didn't investigate much more either.
